attributes.action: Impeach Tony Blair for war crimes
attributes.additional_details: For Parliament to impeach former prime minister Tony Blair for war crimes. For wilfully misleading the public about Iraq and causing mayhem, death and destruction on a vast scale with consequences still resonating to this day; for destabilising the Middle East with security repurcussions worldwide. For fomenting a 'clash of civilisations' scenario with the Islamic world leading to attacks on Muslim and other minorities everywhere.
